colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @0157A *, ,(CES PA 'DI YANG DAD STOBS LDAN PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BSOD NAMS KYIS, ,TSE 'DI'I PHA 'JAM DPAL SKYABS DANG, MA BLA BLO BZANG DGE 'PHEL GNYIS KYIS MTSON PA'I 'GRO RNAMS, ,MYUR DU ZUNG 'JUG RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO'I GO 'PHANG THOB PA'I RGYUR DMIGS STE, ,NGAN SONG SBYONG RGYUD KYI PAR BZHENGS SMON TSIG 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGOR, ,YONGS 'DZIN MING PA BAN RGAN NGAG DBANG 'OD ZER BGYIS PA'O MANGGA LAm WA BHANTU, ,)
